landing.noapp: Simufunika pulogalamu kuti mugwiritse ntchito {{ BRAND }} pafoni kapena piritsi yanu! Tsambali limagwira ntchito bwino pa mafoni.
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) ndi njira yabwino yopezera anzanu atsopano. Mukamagwiritsa ntchito {{ BRAND }}, timasankha wina mwachisawawa ndikukulolani kuti muyankhule m'modzi-m'modzi. Kukuthandizani kuti mukhale otetezeka, macheza sadziwika pokhapokha mutauza wina kuti ndinu ndani (osavomerezeka!), ndipo mutha kuyimitsa macheza nthawi iliyonse. Onani <6>Migwirizano yathu</6>, ndi <8>Malangizo ammudzi</8> kuti mudziwe zambiri zomwe mungachite ndi zomwe simuyenera kuchita pogwiritsa ntchito {{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} macheza amakanema amayendetsedwa ndi AI koma palibe kuwongolera komwe kuli koyenera. Ogwiritsa ntchito ali ndi udindo pazochita zawo pomwe akugwiritsa ntchito {{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>Muyenera kukhala 18 (kapena ambiri mwalamulo m'dera lanu) kapena kupitilirapo kuti mugwiritse ntchito {{BRAND}}</0>. Onani {{BRAND}}'s <4>Mgwirizano ndi Zolinga</4> kuti mudziwe zambiri. Chitetezo cha makolo chomwe chingathandize makolo kupezeka pamalonda ndipo mutha kupeza zambiri pa <6>https://www.connectsafely.org/controls</6> komanso masamba ena.
landing.pleaseleave: Chonde chokani ku Lamdazle ndikuchezera malo achikulire m'malo mwake ngati ndi zomwe mukuyang'ana ndipo muli ndi zaka 18 (kapena ambiri mwalamulo m'dera lanu) kapena kupitilira apo.
landing.termscheck: Pochonga m'bokosilo mukuvomereza kuti mwaunikanso kuvomereza kuti muzitsatira {{BRAND}}'s <3>Migwirizano ndi Migwirizano</3>, <5>Mfundo Zazinsinsi</5> ndi <7>Malangizo a Community</7 >.
landing.agecheck: Simungagwiritse ntchito ntchitoyi ngati muli ndi zaka zosakwana 18 kapena zaka zovomerezeka mwalamulo m'dera lanu. Onani <1>Migwirizano yathu</1> kuti mudziwe zambiri. <3>Pochonga m'bokosi mumavomereza ndikuyimira kuti muli ndi zaka 18 (kapena ndinu ochuluka mwalamulo m'dera lanu) kapena kupitilira apo.</3>
